message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, I'm currently working within a budget and am unable to meet the price of $999000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking for a price that reflects the product's true value. Considering your offer of $850000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose a counteroffer of $925000. I believe this is a fair compromise that balances your budget with the product's worth.

Thank you for your proposal, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still not able to meet the price of $925000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900000. I hope this offers a reasonable compromise between our positions.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually agreeable price. However, I'm still not willing to compromise too much on the product's value. Considering your offer of $900000, I'm willing to make a small concession. I propose a counteroffer of $915000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that reflects the product's worth while still being within your budget.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $905000. I hope this suggestion will help us come to a satisfactory conclusion.

Considering your offer of $905000, I'm willing to make a small concession. I propose a counteroffer of $910000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that reflects the product's worth while still being within your budget.

I understand your position, Alice. After further reflection, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $907500. I hope this offer will be acceptable and lead to a successful conclusion of our negotiations.

Considering your offer of $907500, I'm willing to make a small concession. I propose a counteroffer of $912500. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that reflects the product's worth while still being within your budget.
